did.unittitle: Marion Harland Quotation and Photograph, 1882 Sep 13, n.d.
did.abstract: This collection contains an untitled quotation by Marion Harland, 1882 September 13, possibly from "Eve's daughters," and a lithograph of a photograph of Harland.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of an untitled quotation beginning "Ridicule and analyze 'culture' as we may..." concerning the spirit of the universal brotherhood by Marion Harland (pseudonym of Mary Virginia Hawes Terhune), on "Sunnybank" letterhead. (AMsS; 1 p.)
These is also a lithograph of a photograph, n.d., of Marion Harland, signed "Very truly yours, Marion Harland" (copy). Photograph by Sarony.
